2022-03-01.name: Estab-Life: Great Escape
2022-03-01.desc:
In the distant future the world population has begun to shrink after reaching its peak. The "Supernatural Renovation Project" splits Tokyo with towering walls into several Cluster neighborhoods, each with its own unique genetically modified populations, governed by artificial intelligence. Most people live their lives in their own unique Clusters, blissfully unconcerned with life beyond. However, there are some who seek to escape to the other Clusters. An outfit helps those who wish to escape.

Source: ANN

2022-03-04.name: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Little Star Wars 2021
Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Die Neue These - Gekitotsu
2022-03-04.desc: * Based on Tanaka Yoshiki's series of science fiction novels by the same name.

2022-03-10.name: Kotarou wa Hitorigurashi
2022-03-10.desc:
* Based on a comedy manga by Tsumura Mami.

Ding-dong! There is a little boy standing at the door. He hands over a nice box of tissues as a gift and says, "My name is Satou, and I have just moved in to number 203. Pleased to make your acquaintance." He is Satou Kotarou, and he has moved into Shimizu Apartments to live by himself. He is four years old. He makes his daily shopping trips alone with a toy sword strapped to his side. Both grown-up and childish at the same time, Kotarou starts to affect the people around him with his wise ways. This is the story of a four-year-old boy who is determined to live strong until the day he can live with his parents.

Source: Netflix

2022-03-10.name: Totsukuni no Shoujo (2022)
2022-03-10.desc:
* Based on a dark fantasy shounen manga by Nagabe.

Once upon a time, in a far, faraway place, there were two lands. The world was divided into an inner land and an outer land. People feared the outer land, inhabited by eerie beings, the carriers of curse. One day, on the border to the inner land inhabited by humans, one such being finds a girl on heaps of abandoned dead bodies. The girl says her name is Shiva and shows affection to the "being" who found her, calling him "Teacher."
This is a story of two people—one human, one inhuman— who linger in the hazy twilight that separates night from day.

Source: Official website
